ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 302
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Tammy, I heard it was 48 in real time hours, (your average daily time). Getting suff back can depend a little on where you died and if you can find youself.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Tammy,
I heard it was 48 in real time hours, (your average daily time).

Getting suff back can depend a little on where you died and if you can find
youself.
I died once in some place, (Don't remember know, just finally gave up),
Couldn't find it and basically had to start over.
One thing I do is if you can get a couple of good weapons for your character
is to place one in the bank, that way if you die
you can go to the bank and get it out so you can go get your corpse. At
least you'll have some weaponry to defend yourself.

Also if you died at Orc hill or somewhere like that try to group and see if
they would cover you until you can get all your stuff back.

*******************************************************
Steven R. Hulse
Denver, CO.
*******************************************************
Durgaa Lvl-7 F Ranger
Schizney Lvl-5 M Mage
Printor Lvl-7 M Warrior
WenLaren Lvl-2 M Wizard
Ahlanna Lvl-4 F Paladin
*******************************************************
Playing mostly in Greater Fey on Solsek Ro Server
*******************************************************
